statements: SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 OR customer_id = 102 AND transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY transaction_amount ASC
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 101;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE stock_quantity > 0 AND price < 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.date, p.product_name FROM transactions t INNER JOIN products p ON t.transaction_id = p.product_id WHERE t.amount < p.price;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transactions;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT transaction_amount, customer_name FROM transactions JOIN customers ON transactions.customer_id = customers.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%'
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT t.transaction_id, c.customer_name, p.product_name FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN products p ON t.amount < p.price;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com'
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS order_count FROM orders GROUP BY user_id
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 100 ORDER BY payment_date
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'electronics'
SELECT order_id, user_id, product_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount < 500 ORDER BY payment_date
